Radiation_Emission.display_help: The Radiation Emission power utilizes the healing properties of radiation to re-energize your allies. This power radiates out from the Rikti and restores some health to all nearby allies.
Radiation_Emission.display_target_help: The Radiation Emission power utilizes the healing properties of radiation to re-energize your allies. This power radiates out from the Rikti and restores some health to all nearby allies.

Accelerate_Metabolism.display_help: Activating this power emits radiation that increases the running speed, attack speed, Endurance Recovery and Damage potential of all nearby allies. Affected Rikti Metabolism is increased so much that they become resistant to effects such as Sleep, Hold, Disorient and Immobilization. The Rikti are not protected from such effects, they just ware off faster.
Accelerate_Metabolism.display_target_help: Activating this power emits radiation that increases the running speed, attack speed, Endurance Recovery and Damage potential of all nearby allies. Affected Rikti Metabolism is increased so much that they become resistant to effects such as Sleep, Hold, Disorient and Immobilization. The Rikti are not protected from such effects, they just ware off faster.
Accelerate_Metabolism.display_attacker_hit: {PlayerSource} begins to accelerate the metabolism of all nearby allies.
Accelerate_Metabolism.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} boosts your damage, speed, recharge, recovery and resistance to status effects with {PowerName}.
